page.title: 13EDUCATION AROUND MK WESTON
page.content: Suffolk Education Committee with offices in Ipswich is responsible for the education of children in Suffolk. Local schools come within the Western Area & are administered from offices in Bury St Edmunds.Children are edu- cated in Primary schools:5-9 years; Middle schools:9-13 years;Upper schools 13-18 years.Barningham Primary school receives children from Barningham with 80 pupils in 4 classes.Hopton Primary school receives children from Hopton, Market Weston & surrounding areas with 63 pupils in 3 classes.Pupils are in classes according to age in both schools & transfer to Stanton Middle, thence to Thurston Upper.Children are transported in County council contract- ed coaches if they live certain distances away from the schools. Some parents choose to pay to send their children to private schools.
